== Introduction ==

Hi, my name is Javier Moreno aka ElPasmo, I'm 30 years old and I'm at the last year of Computer Engineering. I worked 8 years developing GIS and now I'm interested of contributing with the open-source community.

I speak english, french and spanish. I'm learning python and I'm an Ubuntu user since 2008.

== Community Involvement ==

I try to help one hour per day at #python-es and #ubuntu-es. But I'm willing to get more involved and start developing or fixing bugs.

I'm usually available from 8:00 to 20:00 UTC.
